title: Convert to workspace with flexible FRI crate
description:
Transform p3-uni-stark-mt into a workspace and add a flexible FRI crate similar to han0110/p3-playground/fri-ext.

Goals:
- Keep workspace structure clean with upstream P3 dependencies
- Port fri-flexible-folding from 0xMiden branch
- Take inspiration from han0110/p3-playground/fri-ext structure
- Use latest Plonky3 as base

Structure:
```
p3-uni-stark-mt/ (workspace root)
├── Cargo.toml (workspace)
├── uni-stark-mt/ (the current crate)
└── fri-flexible/ (new FRI with flexible folding)
```

title: Complete quotient computation in prover
description:
The quotient computation in src/prover.rs is currently incomplete:
- Uses hardcoded constraint_degree = 2
- Single-threaded evaluation
- Needs proper chunking logic
- Should compute constraint degree symbolically

Tasks:
1. Port symbolic constraint degree calculation from upstream p3-uni-stark
2. Add parallel quotient evaluation using rayon
3. Implement proper quotient chunking based on computed degree
4. Test with various constraint degrees
